description: A lightweight cotton-and-linen blend ensures these relaxed shorts will keep you comfortable during warm-weather days.
fitting_details: Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
All Big sizes have an 8¾" inseam. Size 46W has a 12½" rise.
All Tall sizes have a 9¾" inseam. Size 46W has a 12½" rise.
Belt loops. Zip fly with a buttoned closure.
Two front angled pockets. Right hip coin pocket. Back left buttoned pocket. Back right welt pocket.
Woven "Polo RL Naval Tailors" patch above the back right pocket.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
